dcterms:creator: Mohammad Aliannejadi
Zahra Abbasiantaeb
Shubham Chatterjee
Jeffery Dalton
Leif Azzopardi
dcterms:description: The TREC iKAT 2023 collection aims to enable researchers to test and evaluate their Conversational Search Agent (CSA) with a set of personalized dialogues and a Personal Text Knowledge Base (PTKB). It includes assessments on relevance and additional dimensions for evaluating generated responses.
dcterms:title: TREC iKAT 2023

dcterms:creator: Arnold Overwijk
Chenyan Xiong
Xiao Liu
Cameron VandenBerg
Jamie Callan
dcterms:description: ClueWeb22 is a dataset containing 10 billion web documents enriched with visual and semantic information, used for various information retrieval tasks.
dcterms:title: ClueWeb22-B

dcterms:creator: Jeffrey Dalton
Chenyan Xiong
Vaibhav Kumar
Jamie Callan
dcterms:description: QReCC is a dataset designed for conversational information seeking, providing a structured format for evaluating conversational agents.
dcterms:title: QReCC

dcterms:creator: Lianmin Zheng

dcterms:description: MS MARCO is a dataset used for evaluating machine learning models in the context of information retrieval, particularly focusing on passage ranking and question answering.
dcterms:title: MS MARCO

dcterms:creator: Pranav Rajpurkar
Jian Zhang
Konstantin Lopyrev
Percy Liang
dcterms:description: SQuAD is a dataset for machine comprehension of text, consisting of over 100,000 questions based on a set of Wikipedia articles.
dcterms:title: SQuAD

dcterms:creator: Siva Reddy
Danqi Chen
Christopher D. Manning
dcterms:description: CoQA is a dataset for conversational question answering, designed to evaluate the ability of models to engage in dialogue and answer questions based on context.
dcterms:title: CoQA
